description: Rename /execute-plan command to /align-plan to better reflect that it aligns the plan with the todo list for tracking, rather than executing the plan itself

rationale.problem: Misleading - sounds like it executes the implementation, but it actually just generates TodoWrite tasks from plan.json
rationale.why_better: Clearly indicates alignment between plan.json and todo list for progress tracking

what_it_actually_does: Generates TodoWrite task list with 'WO-ID | TASK-ID: Description' format
Does NOT execute implementation - just aligns tracking

proposed_change.tool_name: execute_plan → align_plan (or keep execute_plan, just rename command)
proposed_change.aliases: Could keep /execute-plan as alias for backward compatibility

impact: Low - just a naming clarity improvement, functionality unchanged
benefits: Clearer naming: align = sync plan with todo list
Avoids confusion: doesn't sound like it runs implementation
Better UX: users understand what it does
backward_compatibility: Keep /execute-plan as alias or add deprecation notice
